name: Phantom Curse
description:
A short little gamejam platformer where your death destroys the object but in return a phantom version of yourself spawns as a new enemy. Story

You are a cursed human forced to walk over the graveyard till the end of time. Or till you reach your own final grave, but every time you die before that you are cursed to spawn a phantom version of yourself which tries to stop you from reaching any further in your next life. Your goal is to escape this endless loop and rest in peace.

Tutorial

A-D or left stick to move left-right
Space or south button to jump
V / left click or  west button to use sword

This game was made in a group of 5 within 4 days for our school gamejam with the theme "you are the enemy".
